Posts.Content: santabarbarian wrote: I am considering getting Proton Radiation due to a left sided cancer and TNBC. Has anyone had Proton Radiation? If so, how did it go for you, and where were you treated? Thanks! pCR after neoadjuvant chemo Dx 7/13/2018, IDC, Left, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Chemotherapy 8/12/2018 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 12/27/2018 Lumpectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 2/10/2019 Whole-breast: Breast, Lymph nodes Log in to post a reply
